definition.name: ResizablePanelGroup
definition.purpose: Provides a group container for resizable panels, allowing users to adjust the size of child panels interactively.
definition.description: A wrapper component around ResizablePrimitive.PanelGroup that sets up a flex container for resizable panels, supporting both horizontal and vertical layouts. It applies custom styling and passes through all props.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the panel group.

initial.data: A flex container with resizable panels.

when.description: User drags the resize handle between panels.

visible: Panel group with panels at new sizes

definition.visualLayout: A flex container with resizable child panels, supporting both horizontal and vertical orientation.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps ResizablePrimitive.PanelGroup and applies custom class names for layout and direction.

definition.name: ResizablePanel
definition.purpose: Represents an individual resizable panel within a panel group.
definition.description: A wrapper component around ResizablePrimitive.Panel that provides a resizable panel for use within a ResizablePanelGroup. It passes through all props and applies a data attribute for styling.

when.description: User resizes the panel via a handle.

definition.visualLayout: A flex child panel that can be resized within its group.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps ResizablePrimitive.Panel and adds a data attribute for styling.

definition.name: ResizableHandle
definition.purpose: Provides a handle between panels for resizing, optionally displaying a visual grip icon.
definition.description: A wrapper around ResizablePrimitive.PanelResizeHandle that renders a resize handle between panels. Optionally displays a grip icon for better UX. Applies custom styling and supports both horizontal and vertical layouts.

withHandle.description: Whether to display a visual grip icon in the handle.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the handle.

initial.data: A resize handle between panels, optionally with a grip icon.

visible: Resize handle (with or without grip icon)

when.description: User drags the handle to resize adjacent panels.

effects: Adjacent panel sizes are updated interactively

definition.visualLayout: A thin bar between panels, optionally with a grip icon, styled for both horizontal and vertical layouts.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps ResizablePrimitive.PanelResizeHandle, supports an optional grip icon using GripVerticalIcon, and applies custom class names.
